item.title: Alien_dictionary
item.description: 1# -*- encoding: utf-8 -*- 2 3from heapq import heappush, heappop, heapify 4 5class Solution: 6 """ 7@param board: A list of lists of character 8@param words: A list of string 9@return: A list of string 10""" 11 def alienOrder(self, words): 12 # write your code here 13 # TODO: check params 14 graph=self.buildGraph(words) 15 print graph 16 17 # print graph 18 19 inDegree=self.buildInDegree(words, graph) 20 21 # print inDegree 22 23 q=[] 24 for i in inDegree: 25 if inDegree[i]==0: 26 q.

item.title: Reservoir_sampling
item.description: array result for i=0; i<n; i++{ if i<k{ result<-array[i] }else{ r=random(0, i) if r>=k{ continue } array[r]=array[i] } }

item.title: Union find
item.description: 1class UnionFindSet: 2 def __init__(self, n): 3 self.parents=[] 4 self.ranks=[] 5 for i in range(n): 6 self.parents.append(i) 7 self.ranks.append(0) 8 def connected(self, a, b): 9 return self.find(a)==self.find(b) 10 11 def find(self, x): 12 if x!=self.parents[x]: 13 self.parents[x]=self.find(self.parents[x]) 14 return self.parents[x] 15 16 def union(self, x, y): 17 px=self.find(x) 18 py=self.find(y) 19 if self.ranks[px]>self.ranks[py]: 20 self.parents[py]=px 21 if self.ranks[px]<self.ranks[py]: 22 self.parents[px]=py 23 if self.ranks[px]==self.ranks[py]: 24 self.parents[py]=px 25 self.ranks[px]+=1 26 27 28t=UnionFindSet(5) 29print t.

item.title: Heap
item.description: 1package main 2 3import ( 4 "fmt" 5) 6 7func parent(i int) int { 8 return (i - 1) / 2 9} 10 11func left(i int) int { 12 return i*2 + 1 13} 14 15func right(i int) int { 16 return i*2 + 2 17} 18 19func maxHeapify(a []int, i int) { 20 l := left(i) 21 r := right(i) 22 largestIdx := i 23 if l < len(a) && a[l] > a[i] { 24 largestIdx = l 25 } 26 if r < len(a) && a[r] > a[largestIdx] { 27 largestIdx = r 28 } 29 30 if largestIdx !

item.title: Trie
item.description: 1import collections 2import json 3 4class TrieNode(object): 5 def __init__(self, value=0): 6 self.value = value 7 self.isWord = False 8 self.children = collections.OrderedDict() 9 10 @classmethod 11 def insert(cls, root, word): 12 p = root 13 for c in word: 14 child = p.children.get(c) 15 if not child: 16 child = TrieNode(c) 17 p.children[c] = child 18 p = child 19 20 p.isWord = True

item.title: Merge Sort
item.description: 1package main 2 3import( 4 "fmt" 5) 6 7func merge(a, b []int)[]int{ 8 rst:=make([]int, 0, len(a)+len(b)) 9 i:=0 10 j:=0 11 for i<len(a) && j<len(b){ 12 if a[i]<b[j]{ 13 rst=append(rst, a[i]) 14 i++ 15 }else{ 16 rst=append(rst, b[j]) 17 j++ 18 } 19 } 20 rst=append(rst, a[i:]...) 21 rst=append(rst, b[j:]...) 22 return rst 23} 24 25func mergeSort(s []int)[]int{ 26 if len(s)<=1{ 27 return s 28 } 29 30 middleIdx:=len(s)/2 31 left:=mergeSort(s[:middleIdx]) 32 right:=mergeSort(s[middleIdx:]) 33 return merge(left, right) 34} 35 36func main(){ 37 a:=[]int{3, 1, 0, 2, 9, 7, 6, 8, 5, 4} 38 b:=mergeSort(a) 39 fmt.

item.title: Dlv
item.description: dlv debug main.go list: list current codes s(step): step in stepout: step out n(next): move to next line(step over) args: break a/b/c.go:213 break pkg.GetName bp(breakpoints): list all break points c(continue): continue to next break point or the end

item.title: Quick Sort
item.description: QuickSort(A, p, r) if p<r mid=Partition(A, p, r) QuickSort(A, p, mid-1) QuickSort(A, mid+1, r) Partition(A, p, r) x=A[r] i=p-1 for j=p to r-1 if A[j]<=x i=i+1 exchange A[i] with A[j] i=i+1 exchange A[i] with A[r] // r==j return i

item.title: DFS
item.description: DFS(G) for each u in G.V u.color=WHITE u.parent=nil time=0 for each u in G.V if u.color==WHITE DFS-Visit(G, u) DFS-Visit(G, u) time=time+1 u.displayTime=time u.color=GRAY for each v in G.Adj[u] if v.color==WHITE v.parent=u DFS-Visit(G, v) u.color=BLACK time=time+1 u.finishTime=time

item.title: BFS
item.description: WHITE: before join the queue GRAY: in the queue BLACK: pop from queue, and after visit all the children BFS(G, s) for each u in (G.V-{s}) u.color=WHITE u.d=inf u.parent=nil s.color=GRAY s.d=0 s.parent=nil ENQUEUE(Q, s) while Q is not empty: u=DEQUEUE(Q) for each v in G.Adj(u) if v.color=WHITE v.color=GRAY v.d=u.d+1 v.parent=u ENQUEUE(Q, v) u.color=BLACK

item.title: Bellman Ford
item.description: References: https://www.geeksforgeeks.org/bellman-ford-algorithm-dp-23/ Example: k-flight time: O(|V|*|E|) 1package main 2 3import ( 4 "fmt" 5 "math" 6) 7 8// Edge means the edge in graph 9type Edge struct { 10 src string 11 dst string 12 weight int 13} 14 15func bf(edges []Edge, fromV string) map[string]int { 16 // key为点，value为目前位置到达key点的距离，刚开始全是无限大 17 distMap := make(map[string]int, 0) 18 for _, v := range edges { 19 distMap[v.src] = math.MaxInt32 20 distMap[v.dst] = math.

item.title: Floyd
item.description: 1package main 2 3import ( 4 "fmt" 5 "math" 6) 7 8func f(m [][]int) [][]int { 9 v := len(m) 10 dist := make([][]int, v, v) 11 for i := 0; i < v; i++ { 12 dist[i] = make([]int, v, v) 13 } 14 for i := 0; i < v; i++ { 15 for j := 0; j < v; j++ { 16 dist[i][j] = m[i][j] 17 } 18 } 19 20 for k := 0; k < v; k++ { 21 for i := 0; i < v; i++ { 22 for j := 0; j < v; j++ { 23 newMinForIJ := dist[i][k] + dist[k][j] 24 if newMinForIJ < dist[i][j] { 25 dist[i][j] = newMinForIJ 26 } 27 } 28 } 29 } 30 return dist 31} 32 33func main() { 34 // a b c d 35 // 0 1 2 3 36 // a 0 0 1 6 10 37 // b 1 na 0 2 na 38 // c 2 na na 0 5 39 // d 3 na na na 0 40 m := [][]int{ 41 {0, 1, 6, 10}, 42 {math.

item.title: dijkstra
item.description: 1from collections import defaultdict 2from heapq import * 3 4def dijkstra(edges, fromV, toV): 5 g=defaultdict(list) 6 for src, dst, cost in edges: 7 g[src].append((cost, dst)) 8 9 q, seen, mins=[(0, fromV, [])], set(), {fromV: 0} 10 while q: 11 (cost, src, path)=heappop(q) 12 if src not in seen: 13 seen.add(src) 14 path.append(src) 15 if src==toV: 16 return (cost, path) 17 for w, dst in g.get(src, []): 18 if dst in seen: 19 continue 20 oldCostForDst=mins.

item.title: Serving_1
item.description: Install tensorflow https://docs.python.org/3/library/venv.html python3 -m venv <path> source <path>/bin/activate pip install tensorflow==<version> Use tensorflow/serving git: https://github.com/tensorflow/serving doc: https://www.tensorflow.org/tfx/serving/docker Multi Version(hot reload), Multi Model(cold reload) docker run -t --rm -p 8501:8501 \ -v "$TESTDATA:/models" -d \ -t tensorflow/serving --model_config_file=/models/models.config models.config model_config_list:{ config:{ name:"hello-world", base_path:"/models/hello-world", model_platform:"tensorflow", model_version_policy:{ all:{} } }, config:{ name:"modelA", base_path:"/models/modelA", model_platform:"tensorflow", model_version_policy:{ all:{} } } }

item.title: Slice_1
item.description: The struct of slice in go: 1type slice struct { 2 array unsafe.Pointer 3 len int 4 cap int 5} 1package main 2 3import "fmt" 4 5func main() { 6 a := make([]int, 10, 20) 7 for i := 0; i < 10; i = i + 1 { 8 a[i] = i 9 } 10 11 // means the length of b is 6-3=3, the capicity is 9-3=6 12 b := a[3:6:9] 13 // len(b)=3 14 fmt.

item.title: How to create hugo site
item.description: 0x00 basic commands 1go get -u -v github.com/spf13/hugo 2hugo new site <directory> 3git init 4git submodule add https://github.com/spf13/hyde.git themes/hyde 5hugo new posts/how-to-create.md 0x01 config.toml 1baseURL = "http://wncbb.github.io/" 2languageCode = "en-us" 3title = "WNCBB's blog" 4theme = "hyde" 5 6[Menus] 7 main = [ 8 {Name = "Github", URL = "https://github.com/wncbb/"}, 9 ] 10[params] 11 description = "A man is only as good as what he loves" 12 themeColor = "theme-base-0c" 13 layoutReverse = true 0x02 codes highlight https://gohugo.
